Detailed Description

Describes the StreetSegmentItems (SSI:s) on the map.

This is a subclass to the MERouteableItemLayer since the StreetSegments should be drawn, using information about road class etc.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void MEStreetSegmentItemLayer::drawItems (   )  [virtual]
 

The SSI:s are drawn a bit different from the other items.

E.g. the thickness of the lines depends on the roadclass.

Reimplemented from MEItemLayer.
